io.sphere.sdk.products

Class ProductBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sphere.sdk.models.DefaultModelBuilder<I>
      • io.sphere.sdk.models.DefaultModelFluentBuilder<ProductBuilder,Product>
        • io.sphere.sdk.products.ProductBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Builder<Product>, java.util.function.Supplier<Product>

    public class ProductBuilder
extends DefaultModelFluentBuilder<ProductBuilder,Product>
    Builds test doubles1 for products.

    Example:

    final ProductType productType = getProductType();
final ProductVariant emptyProductVariant = ProductVariantBuilder.of(1).sku("sku-5000").get();
final LocalizedStrings name = LocalizedStrings.of(ENGLISH, "name");
final LocalizedStrings slug = LocalizedStrings.of(ENGLISH, "slug");
final ProductData staged = ProductDataBuilder.of(name, slug, emptyProductVariant).build();
final ProductCatalogData masterData = ProductCatalogDataBuilder.ofStaged(staged).get();

final Product product = ProductBuilder.of(productType, masterData).id("foo-id").build();
assertThat(product.getId()).isEqualTo("foo-id");
final ProductData productData = product.getMasterData().getStaged();
assertThat(productData.getName()).isEqualTo(name);
assertThat(productData.getMasterVariant().getSku()).contains("sku-5000");

    See the test code.
